original_title: 羞恥 新入生発育健康診断２０１７　AVOPENエディション
overview: "Congratulations! I was selected for the prefectural developmental health examination," said the teacher and submitted a written consent from his parents.  There was no reason for me to decline the recommendation because the private statement would be better if I participated.  But ... I never heard or thought that I would be doing such an embarrassing thing!  Naked in front of a nasty boy, rubbed his boobs, widened the hole in his ass ... When  he ran away, he said, "Give up your private statement and recommendation." My heart is about to burn ...
title: Shame New Student Growth and Health Check-up 2017 AV OPEN Edition
